author: craigmcc
msg: Pass the session ID on to a resource called by <bean:include>, even if we
are using cookies for session management ourselves.  Previously, this
worked only if URL rewriting was being used.

author: mschachter
msg: - fix wrapped request issues in 1.0 branch

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a "title" attribute to the <html:link> tag.
